K06bsu051_u:5: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane' nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārthaṃ trayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ saṃbahulaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ /
K06bsu051_u:6: atha khalu bhagavān pūrvāhṇakālasamaye nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat /
K06bsu051_u:7: atha khalu bhagavān śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ
K06bsu051_u:8: pātracīvaraṃ pratiśāmya pādau prakṣālya nyaṣīdatprajñapta evāsane paryaṅkamābhujya
K06bsu051_u:10: atha khalu saṃbahulā bhikṣavo yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāman /
K06bsu051_u:11: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhirabhivandya bhagavantaṃ triṣpradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte nyaṣīdan // 1 //
K06bsu051_u:12: tena khalu punaḥ samayenāyuṣmān subhutistasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatito 'bhūtsaṃniṣaṇṇaḥ /
K06bsu051_u:13: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirutthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
K06bsu051_u:14: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan,
K06bsu051_u:16: yāvadeva tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuparigṛhītāḥ parameṇānugraheṇa /
K06bsu051_u:17: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadeva tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ parīnditāḥ paramayā parīndanayā /
K06bsu051_u:18: tatkathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā sthātavyaṃ kathaṃ pratipattavyaṃ kathaṃ cittaṃ pragrahītavyam?
K06bsu051_u:19: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu subhūte,
K06bsu051_u:25: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru,
K06bsu051_u:26: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te - yathā bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena sthātavyaṃ yathā pratipattavyaṃ yathā cittaṃ pragrahītavyam /
K06bsu051_u:29: - yāvantaḥ subhūte sattvāḥ sattvadhātau sattvasaṃgraheṇa saṃgṛhītā aṇḍajā vā jarāyujā
K06bsu051_u:30: vā saṃsvedajā vā aupapādukā vā rūpiṇo vā arūpiṇo vā saṃjñino vā asaṃjñino vā naivasaṃjñino nāsaṃjñino vā,
K06bsu051_u:32: te ca mayā sarve 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayitavyāḥ /
K06bsu051_u:33: evamaparimāṇānapi sattvān parinirvāpya na kaścitsattvaḥ parinirvāpito bhavati /
K06bsu051_u:38: na sa subhūte bodhisattvo vaktavyo yasya sattvasaṃjñā pravarteta,
K06bsu051_u:40: (Vajr, Vaidya 76) api tu khalu punaḥ subhute na bodhisattvena vastupratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyam,
K06bsu051_u:44: evaṃ hi sūbhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānaṃ dātavyaṃ yathā na nimittasaṃjñāyāmapi pratitiṣṭhet /
K06bsu051_u:47: tasya subhūte puṇyaskandhasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇāmudgrahītum /
K06bsu051_u:48: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte sukaraṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi ākāśasya pramāṇamudgrahītum?
K06bsu051_u:50: bhagavānāha - evaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimottarāsu adha ūrdhvaṃ digvidikṣu samantāddaśasu dikṣu sukaramākāśasya pramāṇamudgrahītum?
K06bsu051_u:52: bhagavānāha - evameva subhūte yo bodhisattvo 'pratiṣṭhito dānaṃ dadāti,
K06bsu051_u:53: tasya subhūte puṇyaskandhasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇamudgrahītum /
K06bsu051_u:54: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena dānaṃ dātavyaṃ yathā na nimittasaṃjñāyāmapi pratitiṣṭhet // 4 //
K06bsu051_u:55: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ?
K06bsu051_u:59: yā sā bhagavan lakṣaṇasaṃpattathāgatena bhāṣitā saivālakṣaṇasaṃpat /
K06bsu051_u:60: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat yāvatsubhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpat tāvanmṛṣā,
K06bsu051_u:61: yāvadalakṣaṇasaṃpat tāvanna mṛṣeti hi lakṣaṇālakṣaṇatastathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ // 5 //
K06bsu051_u:63: kecitsattvā bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralopakāle vartamāne,
K06bsu051_u:65: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ paścime
K06bsu051_u:66: kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralope vartamāne guṇavantaḥ
K06bsu051_u:69: na khalu punaste subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ekabuddhaparyupāsitā bhaviṣyanti,
K06bsu051_u:71: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte anekabuddhaśatasahasraparyupāsitā anekabuddhaśatasahasrāvaropitakuśalamūlāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,
K06bsu051_u:72: ye imeṣvevaṃrūpeṣu sūtrāntapadeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu ekacittaprasādamapi pratilapsyante /
K06bsu051_u:76: sarve te subhūte aprameyamasaṃkhyeyaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyanti pratigrahīṣyanti /
K06bsu051_u:78: na hi subhūte teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmātmasaṃjñā pravartate,
K06bsu051_u:82: nāpi teṣāṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dharmasaṃjñā pravartate /
K06bsu051_u:84: nāpi teṣāṃ subhūte saṃjñā nāsaṃjñā pravartate /
K06bsu051_u:86: sacetsubhūte teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dharmasaṃjñā pravarteta,
K06bsu051_u:94: na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dharma udgrahītavyo nādharmaḥ /
K06bsu051_u:95: tasmādiyaṃ tathāgatena saṃdhāya vāgbhāṣitā - kolopamaṃ dharmaparyāyamājānadbhidharmā eva prahātavyāḥ prāgevādharmā iti // 6 //
K06bsu051_u:96: punaraparaṃ bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte,
K06bsu051_u:99: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi,
K06bsu051_u:100: nāsti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirityabhisaṃbuddhaḥ,
K06bsu051_u:108: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yaḥ kaścitkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
K06bsu051_u:109: lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
K06bsu051_u:110: api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt /
K06bsu051_u:112: bahu sugata sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt /
K06bsu051_u:117: bhagavānāha - yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā va imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
K06bsu051_u:118: lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhyaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
K06bsu051_u:119: yaśca ito dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya parebhyo vistareṇa deśayet saṃprakāśayet,
K06bsu051_u:122: atonirjātā hi subhūte tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
K06bsu051_u:125: buddhadharmā buddhadharmā iti subhūte abuddhadharmāścaiva te tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ /
K06bsu051_u:127: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu srotaāpannasyaivaṃ bhavati - mayā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptamiti?
K06bsu051_u:129: na srotaāpannasyaivaṃ bhavati - mayā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptamiti /
K06bsu051_u:133: na rūpamāpanno na śabdān na gandhān na rasān na spraṣṭavyān dharmānāpannaḥ /
K06bsu051_u:135: sacedbhagavan srotaāpannasyaivaṃ bhavet - mayā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptamiti,
K06bsu051_u:138: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sakṛdāgāmina evaṃ bhavati - mayā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptamiti?
K06bsu051_u:140: sa sakṛdāgāmina evaṃ bhavati - mayā (Vajr, Vaidya 78)
K06bsu051_u:143: na hi sa kaściddharmo yaḥ sakṛdāgāmitvamāpannaḥ /
K06bsu051_u:145: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu anāgāmina evaṃ bhavati - mayānāgāmiphalaṃ prāptamiti?
K06bsu051_u:147: na anāgāmina evaṃ bhavati - mayā anāgāmiphalaṃ prāptamiti /
K06bsu051_u:149: na hi sa bhagavan kaściddharmo yo 'nāgāmitvamāpannaḥ /
K06bsu051_u:151: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu arhata evaṃ bhavati - mayā arhattvaṃ prāptamiti?
K06bsu051_u:153: nārhata evaṃ bhavati - mayā arhattvaṃ prāptamiti /
K06bsu051_u:155: na hi sa bhagavan kaściddharmo yo 'rhannāma /
K06bsu051_u:157: sacedbhagavan arhata evaṃ bhavet - mayā arhattvaṃ prāptamiti,
K06bsu051_u:163: na ca me bhagavannevaṃ bhavati - arhannasmyahaṃ vītarāga iti /
K06bsu051_u:164: sacenmama bhagavannevaṃ bhavet - mayā arhattvaṃ prāptamiti,
K06bsu051_u:165: na māṃ tathāgato vyākariṣyadaraṇāvihāriṇāmagryaḥ subhūtiḥ kulaputro na kvacidviharati,
K06bsu051_u:167: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - asti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhata - samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādudgṛhītaḥ?
K06bsu051_u:169: nāsti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādudgṛhītaḥ //
K06bsu051_u:170: bhagavānāha - yaḥ kaścitsubhūte bodhisattva evaṃ vadet - ahaṃ kṣetravyūhān niṣpādayiṣyāmīti,
K06bsu051_u:173: kṣetravyūhāḥ kṣetravyūhā iti subhūte avyūhāste tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ /
K06bsu051_u:175: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evamapratiṣṭhitaṃ cittamutpādayitavyaṃ yanna kvacitpratiṣṭhitaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam /
K06bsu051_u:177: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo bhavedupetakāyo mahākāyo yattasyaivaṃ rūpa ātmabhāvaḥ syāt tadyathāpi nāma sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ /
K06bsu051_u:178: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu mahān sa ātmabhāvo bhavet?
K06bsu051_u:182: ātmabhāva ātmabhāva iti bhagavan na bhāvaḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
K06bsu051_u:184: na hi bhagavan sa bhāvo nābhāvaḥ /
K06bsu051_u:186: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - yāvatyo gaṅgāyāṃ mahānadyāṃ vālukāstāvatya eva gaṅgānadyo bhaveyuḥ?
K06bsu051_u:189: subhūtirāha - tā eva tāvadbhagavan bahvayo gaṅgānadyo bhaveyuḥ,
K06bsu051_u:194: yāvatyastāsu gaṅgānadīṣu vālukā bhaveyustāvato lokadhātūn kaścideva strī vā puruṣo vā saptaratnaparipurṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
K06bsu051_u:195: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte - api nu sā strī vā puruṣo vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt?
K06bsu051_u:197: bahu sugata strī vā puruṣo vā tatonidānaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyādaprameyamasaṃkhyeyam /
K06bsu051_u:198: bhagavānāha - yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā tāvato lokadhātūn saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
K06bsu051_u:199: yaśca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ito dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya parebhyo deśayet saṃprakāśayet,
K06bsu051_u:201: api tu khalu punaḥ subhute yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe ito dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya bhāṣyeta vā saṃprakāśyeta vā,
K06bsu051_u:203: kaḥ punarvādo ye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sakalasamāptaṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
K06bsu051_u:205: parameṇa te subhūte āścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
K06bsu051_u:206: tasmiṃśca subhūte pṛthivīpradeśe śāstā viharatyanyatarānyataro vā vijñagurusthānīyaḥ // 12 //
K06bsu051_u:207: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - ko nāma ayaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaḥ,
K06bsu051_u:209: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - prajñāpāramitā nāmāyaṃ subhūte dharmaparyāyaḥ /
K06bsu051_u:215: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - api nu asti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ?
K06bsu051_u:218: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - yāvat trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau pṛthivīrajaḥ kaccit,
K06bsu051_u:229: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho draṣṭavyaḥ?
K06bsu051_u:234: yāni hi tāni bhagavan dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni tathāgatena bhāṣitāni,
K06bsu051_u:237: bhagavānāha - yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā dine dine gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānātmabhāvān parityajet,
K06bsu051_u:239: yaśca ito dharmaparyāyadantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhyaparebhyo deśayet saṃprakāśayet,
K06bsu051_u:247: na mayā bhagavan jātvevaṃrūpo dharmaparyāyaḥ śrutapūrvaḥ /
K06bsu051_u:248: parameṇa te bhagavan āścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bodhisattvā bhaviṣyanti,
K06bsu051_u:249: ye iha sūtre bhāṣyamāṇe śrutvā bhūtasaṃjñāmutpādayiṣyanti /
K06bsu051_u:254: na mama bhagavan āścaryaṃ yadahamimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣyamāṇamavakalpayāmi adhimucye /
K06bsu051_u:255: ye 'pi te bhagavan sattvā bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralope vartamāne,
K06bsu051_u:256: ye imaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
K06bsu051_u:259: api tu khalu punarbhagavan na teṣāmātmasaṃjñā pravartiṣyate,
K06bsu051_u:260: na sattvasaṃjñā na jīvasaṃjñā na pudgalasaṃjñā pravartiṣyate,
K06bsu051_u:269: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametat subhūte, evametat /
K06bsu051_u:271: ye iha subhūte sūtre bhāṣyamāṇe notrasiṣyanti na (Vajr, Vaidya 81)
K06bsu051_u:275: yāṃ ca subhūte tathāgataḥ paramapāramitāṃ bhāṣate,
K06bsu051_u:278: api tu khalu punaḥ subhute yā tathāgatasya kṣāntipāramitā,
K06bsu051_u:282: nāsīnme tasmin samaye ātmasaṃjñā vā sattvasaṃjñā vā jīvasaṃjñā vā pudgalasaṃjñā vā,
K06bsu051_u:283: nāpi me kācitsaṃjñā vā asaṃjñā vā babhūva /
K06bsu051_u:285: sacenme subhūte tasmin samaye ātmasaṃjñā abhaviṣyat,
K06bsu051_u:290: abhijānāmyahaṃ subhūte atīte 'dhvani pañca jātiśatāni yadahaṃ kṣāntivādī ṛṣirabhūvam /
K06bsu051_u:295: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasaṃjñā vivarjayitvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayitavyam /
K06bsu051_u:303: tasmādeva tathāgato bhāṣate - apratiṣṭhitena bodhisattvena dānaṃ dātavyam /
K06bsu051_u:305: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena evaṃrūpo dānaparityāgaḥ kartavyaḥ sarvasattvānāmarthāya /
K06bsu051_u:309: ya evaṃ te sarvasattvāstathāgatena bhāṣitāsta eva asattvāḥ /
K06bsu051_u:314: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yastathāgatena dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddho deśito nidhyātaḥ,
K06bsu051_u:316: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo 'ndhakārapraviṣṭo na kiṃcidapi paśyet,
K06bsu051_u:317: evaṃ vastupatito bodhisattvo draṣṭavyo yo vastupatito dānaṃ parityajati /
K06bsu051_u:318: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte cakṣuṣmān puruṣaḥ prabhātāyāṃ rātrau sūrye 'bhyudgate nānavidhāni rūpāṇi paśyet,
K06bsu051_u:319: evamavastupatito bodhisattvo draṣṭavyo yo 'vastupatito dānaṃ parityajati //
K06bsu051_u:320: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ye kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
K06bsu051_u:325: sarve te subhūte sattvā aprameyamasaṃkhyeyaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyanti pratigrahīṣyanti // 14 //
K06bsu051_u:326: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā purvāhṇakālasamaye gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānātmabhāvān parityajet,
K06bsu051_u:334: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte acintyo 'tulyo 'yaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ /
K06bsu051_u:335: ayaṃ ca subhūte dharmaparyāyastathāgatena bhāṣito 'grayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya,
K06bsu051_u:337: ye imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
K06bsu051_u:342: sarve te subhūte sattvā aprameyeṇa puṇyaskandhenāṃ samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
K06bsu051_u:344: sarve te subhūte sattvāḥ samāṃśena bodhiṃ dhārayiṣyanti vacayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti /
K06bsu051_u:346: na hi śakyaṃ subhūte ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo hīnādhimuktiakaiḥ sattvaiḥ śrotum,
K06bsu051_u:348: nābodhisattvapratijñai sattvaiḥ śakyamayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ śrotuṃ vā udgrahītuṃ vā dhārayituṃ vā vācayituṃ vā paryavāptuṃ vā /
K06bsu051_u:350: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yatra pṛthivīpradeśe idaṃ sūtraṃ prakaśayiṣyate,
K06bsu051_u:351: pūjanīyaḥ sa pṛthivīpradeśo bhaviṣyati sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya /
K06bsu051_u:354: api tu ye te subhūte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imānevaṃrūpān sūtrāntānudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
K06bsu051_u:360: yāni ca teṣāṃ subhūte sattvānāṃ paurvajanmikānyaśubhāni karmāṇi kṛtānyapāyasaṃvartanīyāni, (Vajr, Vaidya 83)
K06bsu051_u:361: dṛṣṭa eva dharme paribhūtatayā tāni paurvajanmikānyaśubhāni karmāṇi kṣapayiṣyanti,
K06bsu051_u:364: tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pareṇa paratareṇa caturaśītibuddhakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇyabhūvan ye mayārāgitāḥ,
K06bsu051_u:366: yacca mayā subhūte te buddhā bhagavanta ārāgitāḥ,
K06bsu051_u:368: yacca paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralopakāle vartamāne imānevaṃrūpān sūtrāntānudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
K06bsu051_u:370: asya khalu punaḥ subhūte puṇyaskandhasyāntikādasau paurvakaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti,
K06bsu051_u:371: sahasratamīmapi śatasahasratamīmapi koṭimamipi koṭiśatatamīmapi koṭiśatasahasratamīmapi koṭiniyutaśatasahasratamīmapi /
K06bsu051_u:372: saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi upamāmapi upaniṣadamapi yāvadaupamyamapi na kṣamate //
K06bsu051_u:373: sacetpunaḥ subhūte teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā ahaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ bhāṣeyam,
K06bsu051_u:374: yāvatte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tasmin samaye puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyanti,
K06bsu051_u:377: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte acintyo 'tulyo 'yaṃ dharmaparyāyastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
K06bsu051_u:379: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena sthātavyam,
K06bsu051_u:382: bhagavānāha - iha subhūte bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena evaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - sarve sattvā mayā anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayitavyāḥ
K06bsu051_u:383: evaṃ sa sattvān parinirvāpya na kaścitsattvaḥ parinirvāpito bhavati /
K06bsu051_u:390: nāsti subhūte sa kaściddharmo yo bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthito nāma //
K06bsu051_u:391: (Vajr, Vaidya 84) tatkiṃ manyase subhūte asti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyāntikādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ?
K06bsu051_u:392: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yathāhaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi,
K06bsu051_u:393: nāsti sa bhagavan kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ
K06bsu051_u:395: nāsti subhūte sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ
K06bsu051_u:397: na māṃ dīpaṃkarastathāgato vyākariṣyat - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava anāgate 'dhvani śākyamunirnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti /
K06bsu051_u:398: yasmāttarhi subhūte tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena nāsti sa kaściddharmo yo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ,
K06bsu051_u:399: tasmādahaṃ dīpaṃkareṇa tathāgatena vyākṛta - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava anāgate 'dhvani śākyamunirnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha /
K06bsu051_u:407: yaḥ kaścitsubhūte evaṃ vadet - tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddheti,
K06bsu051_u:411: nāsti subhūte sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
K06bsu051_u:412: yaśca subhūte tathāgatena dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddho deśito vā tatra na satyaṃ na mṛṣā /
K06bsu051_u:417: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo bhavedupetakāyo mahākāyaḥ?
K06bsu051_u:418: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - yo 'sau bhagavaṃstathāgatena puruṣo bhāṣita upetakāyo mahākāya iti,
K06bsu051_u:422: yo bodhisattva evaṃ vadet - ahaṃ sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmiti,
K06bsu051_u:425: asti subhūte sa kaściddharmo yo bodhisattvo nāma?
K06bsu051_u:427: nāsti sa kaściddharmo yo bodhisattvo (Vajr, Vaidya 85) nāma /
K06bsu051_u:428: bhagavānāha - sattvāḥ sattvā iti subhūte asattvāste tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ,
K06bsu051_u:430: tasmāttathāgato bhāṣate - nirātmānaḥ sarvadharmā nirjīvā niṣpoṣā niṣpudgalāḥ sarvadharmā iti //
K06bsu051_u:431: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattva evaṃ vadet - ahaṃ kṣetravyūhānniṣpādayiṣyāmīti,
K06bsu051_u:434: kṣetravyūhāḥ kṣetravyūhā iti subhūte avyūhāste tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ /
K06bsu051_u:436: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo nirātmāno dharmā nirātmāno dharmā ityadhimucyate,
K06bsu051_u:438: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - saṃvidyate tathāgatasya māṃsacakṣuḥ?
K06bsu051_u:441: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte saṃvidyate tathāgatasya divyaṃ cakṣuḥ?
K06bsu051_u:444: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte saṃvidyate tathāgatasya prajñācakṣuḥ?
K06bsu051_u:447: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte saṃvidyate tathāgatasya dharmacakṣuḥ?
K06bsu051_u:450: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte saṃvidyate tathāgatasya buddhacakṣuḥ?
K06bsu051_u:453: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yāvantyo gaṅgāyāṃ mahānadyāṃ vālukāḥ,
K06bsu051_u:458: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yāvatyo gaṅgāyāṃ mahānadyāṃ vālukāḥ,
K06bsu051_u:466: bhagavānāha - yāvantaḥ subhūte teṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
K06bsu051_u:469: cittadhārā cittadhāreti subhūte adhāraiṣā tathāgatena bhāṣitā,
K06bsu051_u:475: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yaḥ kaścitkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
K06bsu051_u:476: lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
K06bsu051_u:478: sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt?
K06bsu051_u:482: bahu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyādaprameyamasaḥkhyeyam /
K06bsu051_u:484: puṇyaskandhaḥ puṇyaskandha iti subhūte askandhaḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
K06bsu051_u:488: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte rūpakāyapariniṣpattyā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ?
K06bsu051_u:492: rūpakāyapariniṣpattī rūpakāyapariniṣpattiriti bhagavan apariniṣpattireṣā tathāgatena bhāṣitā /
K06bsu051_u:494: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ?
K06bsu051_u:501: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu tathāgatasyaivaṃ bhavati - mayā dharmo deśita iti?
K06bsu051_u:502: subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan tathāgatasyaivaṃ bhavati - mayā dharmo deśita iti /
K06bsu051_u:503: bhagavānāha - yaḥ subhūte evaṃ vadet - tathāgatena dharmo deśita iti,
K06bsu051_u:507: dharmadeśanā dharmadeśaneti subhūte nāsti sa kaściddharmo yo dharmadeśanā nāmopalabhyate //
K06bsu051_u:508: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - asti bhagavan kecitsattvā bhaviṣyantyanāgate
K06bsu051_u:509: 'dhvani paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralope vartamāne,
K06bsu051_u:511: bhagavānāha - na te subhūte sattvā nāsattvāḥ /
K06bsu051_u:513: sattvāḥ sattvā iti subhūte sarve te subhūte asattvāstathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ /
K06bsu051_u:515: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - api nu asti sa kaściddharmaḥ,
K06bsu051_u:518: nāsti sa bhagavan kaściddharmo yastathāgatenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
K06bsu051_u:520: aṇurapi tatra dharmo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate /
K06bsu051_u:522: (Vajr, Vaidya 87) api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte samaḥ sa dharmo na tatra kaścidviṣamaḥ /
K06bsu051_u:524: nirātmatvena niḥsattvatvena nirjīvatvena niṣpudgalatvena samā sā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ sarvaiḥ kuśalairdharmairabhisaṃbudhyate /
K06bsu051_u:526: kuśalā dharmāḥ kuśalā dharmā iti subhūte adharmāścaiva te tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ /
K06bsu051_u:528: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhute strī vā puruṣo vā yāvantastrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sumeravaḥ parvatarājānaḥ,
K06bsu051_u:529: tāvato rāśīn saptānāṃ ratnānāmabhisaṃhṛtya tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
K06bsu051_u:530: yaśca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā itaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya parebhyo deśayet,
K06bsu051_u:531: asya subhūte puṇyaskandhasya asau paurvakaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti,
K06bsu051_u:533: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - api nu tathāgatasyaivaṃ bhavati - mayā sattvāḥ parimocitā iti?
K06bsu051_u:534: na khalu punaḥ subhūte evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
K06bsu051_u:537: yadi punaḥ subhūte kaścitsattvo 'bhaviṣyadyastathāgatena parimocitaḥ syāt,
K06bsu051_u:540: ātmagrāha iti subhūte agrāha eṣa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
K06bsu051_u:542: bālapṛthagjanā iti subhūte ajanā eva te tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ /
K06bsu051_u:544: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ?
K06bsu051_u:558: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmime gāthe abhāṣata -
K06bsu051_u:559: ye māṃ rūpeṇa cādrākṣurye māṃ ghoṣeṇa cānvaguḥ /
K06bsu051_u:560: mithyāprahāṇaprasṛtā na māṃ drakṣyanti te janāḥ // 1 //
K06bsu051_u:561: dharmato buddho draṣṭavyo dharmakāyā hi nāyakāḥ /
K06bsu051_u:562: dharmatā ca na vijñeyā na sā śakyā vijānitum // 2 // 26 //
K06bsu051_u:563: (Vajr, Vaidya 88) tatkiṃ manyase subhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā?
K06bsu051_u:564: na khalu punaste subhūte evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
K06bsu051_u:566: na hi subhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā syāt /
K06bsu051_u:567: na khalu punaste subhūte kaścidevaṃ vadet - bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitaiḥ kasyaciddharmasya vināśaḥ prajñaptaḥ ucchedo veti /
K06bsu051_u:568: na khalu punaste subhūte evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
K06bsu051_u:570: na bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitaiḥ kasyaciddharmasya vināśaḥ prajñapto nocchedaḥ // 27 //
K06bsu051_u:571: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāṃllokadhātūn saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
K06bsu051_u:572: yaśca bodhisattvo nirātmakeṣvanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiṃ pratilabhate,
K06bsu051_u:574: na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena puṇyaskandhaḥ parigrahītavyaḥ /
K06bsu051_u:575: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - nanu bhagavan bodhisattvena puṇyaskandhaḥ parigrahītavyaḥ?
K06bsu051_u:578: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yaḥ kaścidevaṃ vadet - tathāgato gacchati vā āgacchati vā tiṣṭhati vā niṣīdati vā,
K06bsu051_u:583: tathāgata iti subhūte ucyate na kvacidgato na kutaścidāgataḥ /
K06bsu051_u:585: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yāvanti trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau pṛthivīrajāṃsi,
K06bsu051_u:586: tāvatāṃ lokadhātūnāmevaṃrūpaṃ maṣiṃ kuryāt yāvadevamasaṃkhyeyena vīryeṇa tadyathāpi nāma paramāṇusaṃcayaḥ,
K06bsu051_u:587: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - api nu bahuḥ sa paramāṇusaṃcayo bhavet?
K06bsu051_u:612: yo hi kaścitsubhūte evaṃ vadet - ātmadṛṣṭistathāgatena bhāṣitā,
K06bsu051_u:614: api nu sa subhūte samyagvadamāno vadet?
K06bsu051_u:622: bhagavānāha - evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena sarvadharmā jñātavyā draṣṭavyā adhimoktavyāḥ /
K06bsu051_u:626: dharmasaṃjñā dharmasaṃjñeti subhūte asaṃjñaiṣā tathāgatena bhāṣitā /
K06bsu051_u:628: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'prameyānasaṃkhyeyāṃllokadhātūn saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
K06bsu051_u:629: yaśca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā itaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya dhārayeddeśayedvācayet paryavāpnuyāt,
K06bsu051_u:635: svapnaṃ ca vidyudabhraṃ ca evaṃ draṣṭavya saṃskṛtam //
K06bsu051_u:639: sthavirasubhūtiste ca bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāste ca bodhisattvāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti //
